insert.foreach: into buylist (product_id, su, address, phone, userid, ordername) values ( #{item.product_id}, #{item.su}, #{vo.addresses}, #{vo.phones}, #{vo.userid}, #{vo.ordername} )

mapper.insert: insert into buylistdummy (product, su, price, userid) values (#{product}, #{su}, #{price}, #{userid})
mapper.select: select b.orderno, d.product_img_path, b.ordername, b.address , b.phone, b.su, p.product_name, b.su * p.product_price as price, b.buy_date, d.detail_id from buylist b, product p, (select * from product_detail where detail_id in (select min(detail_id) from product_detail group by product_id)) d where b.userid= #{userid} and b.product_id = p.product_id and p.product_id = d.product_id(+) order by p.product_id
